General.Name: Dusit Thani Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust
General.Description: Dusit Thani Freehold and Leasehold Real Estate Investment Trust is a real estate investment trust. The firm focuses on investing in high potential freehold or leasehold properties especially in hotel properties, as well as investing in other assets that favor hotel-related business, such as meeting and convention room, restaurants, fitness center, spa, swimming pool, tennis court etc. The firm is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
General.Address: No. 319 Chamchuri Square Building, Bangkok, Thailand, 10330
